alert.note: Alert for South Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued December 12 at 10:32AM MST until December 12 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in freezing fog. Minor ice accumulation possible. * WHERE...South Laramie Range including the I-80 Summit. * WHEN...Until 2 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Periods of freezing drizzle combined with very low visibility and freezing fog, will result in hazardous travel conditions this morning across southeast Wyoming. Please use extra caution over the Interstate 80 Summit and bridges.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Also, be alert for frost on bridge decks causing slippery roads.
